results.content: This is one of the best courses on Udemy. The SPA concept is working on my web app, the plugin is perfect. I highly recommend this course to everyone who wants to make his single page application projects more easily. Author did a great job on this one!

results.content:
I was fervently looking for a library to accomplish exactly what this course offers. I am very satisfied with the course format and teacher explanations. 

Great job, all around, well worth it. I recommend this course to anyone wanting to develop ASP.NET Core SPA webs using this single JQuery plugin. It's easy to install and configure so you are ready to develop your dream web apps in a few minutes.

I love it and recomend it

results.content: This is the best course in udemy on Java and updated regularly.Toufiq really has put a lot of effort and quality content to create it. The best part is you will always get prompt response if you have any doubts in the lecture or about concept he always help you with patience and ease with lot of many concept you can learn. The best part is that you will learn extra while surfing through the question answers asked in the end of every lecture. It's definitely worth and a must recommendation for those who want to learn through programming.
